H0.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Cauliflower

H1.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Kale

H2.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Cabbage

H3.text: Calabrese is a variety of which vegetable of the cabbage family. Brocoli

A4.text: Calabrese broccoli, often referred to simply as 'broccoli', named after Calabria in Italy.
